title: FS: T222 Fatima Grover Alexander SGC A - SOLD
author: Thromdog

posts.post_title: FS: T222 Fatima Grover Alexander SGC A - SOLD
posts.post_content:
Was planning to keep him longer, but instead making my 1914 Fatima Grover Alexander go. Some say this and the ‘14 CJ are his rookie cards, other say National game and Exhibits are…..arguments made for both sides.

Card is graded Auth because the back is completely covered with scrapbook paper and was likely trimmed as part of the removal. Card is creased but image is strong. Check the comps and you’ll see the prices of him have really boomed with 1’s going over 2k.

I’m asking $[STRIKE]850 $750 [/STRIKE]  $650 shipped with tracking. Can provide references…..

Available via PM to discuss.

[url=https://flic.kr/p/2nH9EeR][img]https://farm66.staticflickr.com/65535/52317850539_d2fe5235be_b.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=https://flic.kr/p/2nH97CP][img]https://farm66.staticflickr.com/65535/52317744223_8c1e70fb66_b.jpg[/img][/url][STRIKE][/STRIKE][STRIKE][/STRIKE]

Forgot I still had this listed!

Price drop to $650…about as cheap as he comes…..
